name: VisuallyHidden
description: A utility component that hides content visually while keeping it accessible to screen readers. Essential for providing additional context to assistive technology users.

accessibility.screenReader: Content is announced by screen readers despite being visually hidden. When focusable is enabled, content becomes visible on focus.

recommendedUsage: Use to provide descriptive text for icon-only buttons, add context for complex UI patterns, or create skip links for keyboard navigation.
antiPatterns: Do not use to hide content from all users - use CSS display:none instead. Do not overuse; provide the same information visually when possible.
